    static AFUNIXSocketAddress
    AFUNIXSocketAddress.unwrap(String hostname, int port)
    Returns an AFUNIXSocketAddress given a special InetAddress hostname that encodes the byte sequence of an AF_UNIX socket address, like those returned by AFSocketAddress.wrapAddress().
